name.en: Special Topic Research for AI Machine Learning

department.ch: 工業管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: This course provides participating students an opportunity to study important research topics and use machine learning as a problem-solving methodology.
goal.en: This course provides participating students an opportunity to study important research topics and use machine learning as a problem-solving methodology.

outline.ch: The instructor will provide adequate guidance to students, helping them to develop efficient machine learning algorithms for data-centric AI modeling in business strategies. Students will learn practical skills in using AI to solve problems in a real setting.
outline.en: The instructor will provide adequate guidance to students, helping them to develop efficient machine learning algorithms for data-centric AI modeling in business strategies. Students will learn practical skills in using AI to solve problems in a real setting.

textbook.ch:
[ Ref ] : 
1. Vaswani, et al., “Attention Is All You Need” 2017. https://arxiv.org/abs/1706.03762 
2. Dzmitry Bahdanau, et al., “Neural Machine Translation by Jointly Learning to Align and Translate” 2016. https://arxiv.org/abs/1409.0473 
3. SNEHA CHAUDHARI, et al., “An Attentive Survey of Attention Models” 2021. https://arxiv.org/abs/1904.02874 
4. Kelvin Xu, et al., “Show, Attend and Tell: Neural Image Caption Generation with Visual Attention” 2016. https://arxiv.org/abs/1502.03044 
5. Richard S. Sutton and Andrew G. Barto, “Reinforcement Learning – An Introduction” 2nd ed., 2018, The MIT Press. https://www.andrew.cmu.edu/course/10-703/textbook/BartoSutton.pdf 
6. Volodymyr Mnih, et al., “Playing Atari with Deep Reinforcement Learning” 2013. https://arxiv.org/abs/1312.5602 
7. Shervin Minaee, et al., “Large Language Models: A Survey” 2024. https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.06196 
8. Yunfan Gao, et al., “Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Large Language Models: A Survey” 2024. https://arxiv.org/abs/2312.10997
textbook.en:
[ Ref ] : 
1. Vaswani, et al., “Attention Is All You Need” 2017. https://arxiv.org/abs/1706.03762 
2. Dzmitry Bahdanau, et al., “Neural Machine Translation by Jointly Learning to Align and Translate” 2016. https://arxiv.org/abs/1409.0473 
3. SNEHA CHAUDHARI, et al., “An Attentive Survey of Attention Models” 2021. https://arxiv.org/abs/1904.02874 
4. Kelvin Xu, et al., “Show, Attend and Tell: Neural Image Caption Generation with Visual Attention” 2016. https://arxiv.org/abs/1502.03044 
5. Richard S. Sutton and Andrew G. Barto, “Reinforcement Learning – An Introduction” 2nd ed., 2018, The MIT Press. https://www.andrew.cmu.edu/course/10-703/textbook/BartoSutton.pdf 
6. Volodymyr Mnih, et al., “Playing Atari with Deep Reinforcement Learning” 2013. https://arxiv.org/abs/1312.5602 
7. Shervin Minaee, et al., “Large Language Models: A Survey” 2024. https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.06196 
8. Yunfan Gao, et al., “Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Large Language Models: A Survey” 2024. https://arxiv.org/abs/2312.10997

gradMethod.ch:
1. HW Assignments - 20％
2. Midterm Report ＆ Presentation - 30％
3. Final Report ＆ Presentation - 50％
gradMethod.en:
1. HW Assignments - 20％
2. Midterm Report ＆ Presentation - 30％
3. Final Report ＆ Presentation - 50％

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力

ch: 系所:限數學系碩士班、工業管理研究所碩士班、工業管理研究所博士班。
en: Department:MSc in Mathematics、Master of Industrial Management、PhD in Industrial Management only.
